message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. This gives you a chance to get something, and I'm willing to share most of the money. What do you say?
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer now. What do you think?
I'm still willing to share, but I think a 70/30 split is more fair considering the value of money has decreased.  Let's end this before the money loses even more value.
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still not willing to give up most of the money. Take it or leave it.
